name: archetype_vs_casebot_rangegate
description: Same as archetype_vs_casebot_test but with preflop_range_gate enabled. Tests whether range-gating fixes compressed VPIP across archetypes by downgrading EV labels for out-of-range hands.
hypothesis: Range gating will spread VPIP across archetypes: Rock (Buddha) ~30-40%, TAG (Joan) ~45-55%, Station (Alice) ~70-80%, LAG (Napoleon) ~75-85%. Without it, all cluster at 60-73%.
